scenario_text.value:
...Urk! *huff* *huff*... This thing is way
tougher than I thought!
Oh no!!! Floramon, we’ve got to get out of—
Wait, no we can’t!
...Saki?

We...we can’t run. I mean, if we run away,
just think what’ll happen to the other kids—
And Aoi, of course! They’ll all be in danger!

If anything like that happened... I’m sure
I’d regret it like crazy!

That’s why I...we...we can’t lose here! No
way, no how!
Aaah! Urk... Urgh... Gah!
Floramon?!
It’s... It’s okay! Don’t...worry!
It is not okay!!! I can see you’re suffering!

No... I’m not! This is...something from deep,
deep inside me!

Power, like nothing I’ve felt before... It’s
just gushing out!
I... I can’t hold it in anymore!

Floramon?! Don’t tell me you’re changing
again?!
It...kinda looks like it.

In that case...I beg you...! Something cute
this time! Or at least not creepy!
GRAAAAAAAAAH!
*huff* *huff* *huff*...!
That look...!
Sorry to keep you waiting, Saki!
